snippet: A teenager killed eight people with a knife and wounded five more in northeast China after falling out with his girlfriend, the state news media said Thursday.
abstract: Teenager kills eight people with a knife and wounds five more in northeast China after falling out with his girlfriend.
lead_paragraph: A teenager killed eight people with a knife and wounded five more in northeast China after falling out with his girlfriend, the state news media said Thursday.

headline.seo: Chinese Teenager Kills 8 and Wounds 5 in Knife Attack
headline.main: China: Teenager Kills 8 With a Knife
headline.print_headline: China: Teenager Kills 8 With a Knife
